version_description:
1. Add Notification
2. Fixed Bug
Binance is the safest and most trusted place to buy, sell, and manage your digital currency. This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Facial Verification that can be performed on the APP when resetting 2FA and unlocking account
Improved security
Fixed some issues

Binance App - Trading Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies with ease using our crypto app. This update :
⁃ Homepage revamp.
⁃ Support Futures Calculator.
⁃ You can now convert one cryptocurrency to another. Choose from over 200+ supported pairs to convert.
⁃ Users can post trade advertisements on Binance P2P.
⁃ Bug Fixes & Improvements.

Binance App - Trading Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies with ease using our crypto app.
This update:
- Added lite version, provides popular currency markets, buy/sell crypto, and convert functions.
- Supports the display of Launchpool assets and staking/redeeming history on Savings Assets and History pages.
- Supports viewing the Late Fee and Release Date for Staking.
- Vertical trading layout for Spot & Margin (iOS only）
- Supports extension feature for Options.
- New Battle Activity: Battle to Win, Long VS Short.
